text: Zisas mbe nzua vov wom khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde tuituigira wari ganɨri. Nde muuŋv kɨv kha nuianan ndikndigi bigira suaŋv muuŋv, pani havhargip, pharar havharin mbɨv, ŋanŋanɨv kɨrga. Nde vhɨra maaŋ muuŋv kɨv, nde wari won fhavira kurkurigi bigi ga suaŋv thagi nen muunga. Nde mba khesharigi tɨvir muuŋv kɨrga, mba khesharigi tɨv nde mbevarim, nde ŋgirgɨp kɨrga. Fhe Bakɨme nden hɨrga tuk, ana vhemkora nden hɨgɨrga. Mba tuk, ana mba sɨk vhaaŋ thoon vergim, vhaaŋ ana suirigi tɨvar nden muuŋgirga.
